text:
I saw this in other projects on github (see https://github.com/RIOT-OS/RIOT/wiki) and I think this would be great to have something equivalent here and maybe in other projects.

We can use this issue to discuss what to put there or reject the idea.
title: Add "Developper" documentation

text:
In general, I am very happy to back the idea of a contributor wiki.

However, we should start by adapting the CONTRIBUTING.md of scikit-learn
to a CONTRIBUTING.md to nilearn. The reasons are 1) it gets displayed
github in the pull requests, 2) it is under version control, and can more
easily be curated and reviewed by core devs.
That can be done by cherry-picking some stuff in http://scikit-learn.org/stable/developers/
@GaelVaroquaux, @bthirion thanks for the hints, I'll have a look.
